FuncDef:
The stub command configures an area as a stub area.
The undo stub command cancels the configuration. The stub command configures an area as a stub area. The undo stub command cancels the configuration. By default, no area is configured as a stub area.

ParaDef.Info:
Prevents the ABR from sending Summary LSAs to the stub area.

Prevents the ABR from checking the neighbor status.
